snippet: In its beige book survey, 10 of the Federal Reserve’s 12 banking districts reported moderate growth. A separate report suggested the jobless rate would fall when figures are released on Friday.
abstract: Survey of regional economic conditions in Federal Reserve's 12 districts finds 10 of districts reported moderate growth; Commerce Department reports total factory orders fell 2 percent in January compared with December; orders for core capital goods rose 7.2 percent.
lead_paragraph: In its beige book survey, 10 of the Federal Reserve’s 12 banking districts reported moderate growth. A separate report suggested the jobless rate would fall when figures are released on Friday.

headline.main: In Survey, Fed Finds Economic Growth Is Widespread
headline.print_headline: In Survey, Fed Finds Economic Growth Is Widespread
